Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.core.qos.rss

This package defines an implemenation of the metrics services that uses the ResourceStatusService (RSS) as its underlying infrastructure.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AgentHostUpdater This Service handles subscriptions for Agent/Host topology events.
AgentHostUpdaterListener Callback interface for the AgentHostUpdater service.
AgentTopologyService This Service provides basic topology information for Agents and Nodes.
 

Class Summary
AgentDS This RSS ResourceContext represents an Agent.
AgentFlowDS This RSS ResourceContext represents message flow between two Agents.
AgentHostUpdaterComponent This Component provides the AgentHostUpdater service.
ConfigFinderDataFeedComponent This Components uses the DataFeedRegistrationService to register an RSS properties feed that uses the ConfigFinder to resolve the URL.
CougaarTimer This entity allows RSS tasks to use the COUGAAR ThreadService.
DataWrapper This class wraps RSS DataValues in the Metric API.
DecayingHistoryFormula This RSS formula class encapsules the use of data published into the RSS by DecayingHistory.
DestinationDS This RSS ResourceContext represents a remote Agent to which this Node is communicating.
MetricInterpreter This class is a converter from Metrics to RSS DataValues.
NodeDS This RSS ResourceContext represents a COUGGAR Node.
RSSMetricsServiceImpl This Component is an implementation of MetricsService that uses the RSS for data lookup.
RSSMetricsServiceProvider This Component/Container provides the RSS-based implementation of the MetricsService and MetricsUpdateService, and instantiates the implementations, RSSMetricsServiceImpl and RSSMetricsUpdateServiceImpl respectively, as child Components.
RSSMetricsUpdateServiceImpl This Component is an implementation of MetricsUpdateService that uses the RSS.
ServiceDS This RSS ResourcContext represents subsystems in a Node, other than agents.
TrivialDataFeed This entity implements a simple RSS DataFeed and is used by the RSSMetricsUpdateServiceImpl to push data into the RSS.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.qos.rss Description

This package defines an implemenation of the metrics services that uses the ResourceStatusService (RSS) as its underlying infrastructure. It also defines COUGAAR-specific ResourceContext types and defines the AgentTopologyService for use by other modules.
